DIS_RULE_HEAVILY_ENCUMBERED.description: triggers disadvantage on all rolls, for str, dex, con, when heavily or fully encumbered,

DIS_RULE_UNPROF_ARMOR.description: triggers disadvantage on all rolls, for str, dex, when wearing armor without proficiency

DIS_RULE_UNSEEN_TARGET.description: when attacking unseen target (target invisible, target hidden in shadows or if subject is blinded), triggers disadvantage on attack for all abilities

DIS_RULE_POINT_BLANK.description: when attacking w/ ranged or spell (any ability), and target is too close, triggers disadvantage for attack roll

DIS_RULE_NON_STEALTH_ARMOR.description: wearing a non-stealth armor triggers disadvantage on stealth check

DIS_RULE_SMALL_CREATURE_USING_HEAVY_WEAP.description: small creature using heavy weapon have disadvantage on attack rolls

DIS_RULE_FRIGHTENED.description: when having fear effect, apply disadvantage to attack and check roll (any ability & any skill) when target is the source of fear effect

DIS_RULE_POISONED.description: when poisoned, apply disadvantage to all attack rolls
